title: Finders keepers
creator_credit: Edmund Penney, Jack Wipper, Lori Productions and Sterling Educational Films
brief_description: Illustrates the concept of unfairness in the story of three boys, one of whom has impaired hearing. The boys find a wallet and are unsure what to do when the owner returns. Suitable for primary school level.
creator_credit_for_label: Edmund Penney, Jack Wipper, Lori Productions and Sterling Educational Films
description: Illustrates the concept of unfairness in the story of three boys, one of whom has impaired hearing. The boys find a wallet and are unsure what to do when the owner returns. Suitable for primary school level.
